metadata.name: Driade - La Divina
metadata.description: “Driade - La Divina” is the first NFT of Luna Berlusconi, a woman who wants to talk to all women through art and now, through the Blockchain, reach you too. The harmony arises from a cosmic balance that makes you stoic in the essence of your feelings and desires. You are sitting on the world. You watch it and let yourself be watched. You are serene and confident. Beauty is no longer a doctrine made up of clichés. It is sensuality that is born from and lives thanks to the imperfection that is typical of every human being. This image of a real woman evolving in her sculptural transfiguration seems to send you a clear message: balance is a fine line on which you will need to move carefully, remaining faithful to yourself, without letting yourself be influenced by what surrounds you. You will get the energy you need from the saving drop that runs down the back of the avatar. This hypnotic NFT is a pure expression of poetry and storytelling, secular art and culture.
